gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Knicks 125, Heat 109
gameRecap.excerpt: The Knicks defeated the Heat, 125-109. Jalen Brunson (32 points, four rebounds, eight assists, four 3PT) led the Knicks as OG Anunoby (19 points, four assists) and Julius Randle (19 points, nine rebounds) totaled 38 points. Jimmy Butler led the Heat with 28 points, eight rebounds, and four assists while Bam Adebayo added 12 points and 13 rebounds. The Knicks have now won six straight games (12 of their last 14 since OG Anunoby has been active) to improve to 29-17 while the Heat have now lost six straight and moved to 24-22.
